<h1 align="center">
Memory Card Game</h1>

<p align="center">A memory game built with React, Zustand, and Emotion.</p>


![Site-screenshot](src/images/site-screenshot.PNG)

<!-- FRAMEWORKS -->
## Built With

* [React](https://reactjs.org/)
* [Zustand](https://github.com/pmndrs/zustand)
* [Emotion] (https://emotion.sh/docs/styled)


<!-- GETTING STARTED -->
## Getting Started

Clone the repo
```
git clone https://github.com/izabellewilding/memory-card-game-react
cd memory-card-game-react
```

Install dependencies
```
yarn
```
yarn start
```

* visit http://localhost:3000
